meanings: payment, (채무의 상환) (formal) discharge, pay (out), make a payment

vlive.korean: 뭐 식사 비용을 지불한 것도. It could even be paying for a dinner. 듣기 View video V DRAMA : [Full]스케치 X 앞터V (Sketch X Early Interview)
vlive.english: It could even be paying for a dinner.

vlive.korean: 매도자 쪽에서 수수료를 지불하기 때문에 - 그래요? The sellers pay for it. - Really? 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처 스페셜시즌 EP 30_김종국, LA에 딸하고 와이프 있다!?
vlive.english: The sellers pay for it. - Really?

vlive.korean: 정말 제가 해외 사이트 빨리 오게끔 돈을 지불했는데도... Even though I paid for it to come quickly... 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] 나이스쇼핑챌린지 X 이진이, 손현우 (Nice Shopping Challenge X LEEJINI, SONHYUNWOO)
vlive.english: Even though I paid for it to come quickly...

vlive.korean: [뿌듯 뿌듯, 커피값도 아깝지 않은 경기] 이거는 지불할 만한 것 같아요. [Very proud, it's a match worth paying] I think it's paying. 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처2 ep88_김종국vs문세윤 팔씨름 대결
vlive.english: [Very proud, it's a match worth paying] I think it's paying.

vlive.korean: 형이 굉장히 많은 수강료를 지불했어. and I paid a lot of money. 듣기 View video BTS : BTS Live : Eat Jin + chimchim
vlive.english: and I paid a lot of money.
